name: 3D Ballin II
description:
Balls on a plate roll when the plate is tilted.
In this game, your device is the plate!

Just handle your device, tilt, flip, snap as if you are handling the plate. Then the plate in the screen will move exactly the same as your device does and the balls on the plate will rock and roll accordingly.

Put the balls in the hole of plate by several simple rules.
- All the balls except 'X' balls must pass through plate-colored hole. Avoid black hole.
- Numbered balls must keep the order. Lower first, higher last.
- Finish it as quickly as you can. There are maximum 3 golden balls award per stage for your achievements.

This version contains 96 really fun full challenging stages. Enjoy it! Try to get all golden balls for all stages.
CAUTION: Hold your device tight while playing, or you may miss your favorite device:)
